Uses of Package
io.permazen

Packages that use io.permazen
Package
Description
io.permazen
Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
io.permazen.change
Classes passed to @OnChange-annotated methods.
io.permazen.cli
Components that support integrating Permazen into a Java Console Toolkit console.
io.permazen.cli.config
Classes for parsing command line flags in order to configure a Permazen command line interface (CLI) session.
io.permazen.cli.parse
Permazen parsing related classes.
io.permazen.spring
Spring Framework integration classes.
  • Classes in io.permazen used by io.permazen
    Class
    Description
    CopyState
    Holds state during a multi-object copy operation.
    Counter
    Represents a 64-bit counter value that can be adjusted concurrently by multiple transactions, typically without locking (depending on the underlying key/value store).
    DetachedJTransaction
    A JTransaction that is not actually connected to a Permazen database instance, but instead exists just to hold objects in memory.
    EnumConverter
    Converts between core database EnumValue objects and the corresponding Java Enum model values.
    JClass
    Represents a specific Permazen object type in a Permazen database.
    JCollectionField
    Represents a collection field in a JClass.
    JComplexField
    Represents a complex field in a JClass.
    JCompositeIndex
    A composite index.
    JCounterField
    Represents a counter field in a JClass.
    JEnumArrayField
    Represents an Enum array field in a JClass.
    JEnumField
    Represents an Enum field in a JClass.
    JField
    Represents a field in a Java model object.
    JFieldSwitch
    Visitor pattern interface for JFields.
    JListField
    Represents a list field in a JClass.
    JMapField
    Represents a map field in a JClass.
    JObject
    Interface implemented by Permazen Java model objects.
    JReferenceField
    Represents a reference field in a JClass or a reference sub-field of a complex field in a JClass.
    JSchemaItem
    Superclass for the JClass, JField, and JCompositeIndex classes which describe the schema associated with a Permazen instance.
    JSetField
    Represents a set field in a JClass.
    JSimpleField
    Represents a simple field in a JClass or a simple sub-field of a complex field in a JClass.
    JTransaction
    A transaction associated with a Permazen instance.
    Permazen
    Permazen Java persistence layer.
    PermazenConfig
    Configuration object used to create new Permazen instances.
    PermazenConfig.Builder
    Builder for PermazenConfigs.
    ReferencePath
    Reference paths.
    UpgradeConversionPolicy
    Policies to apply when a simple or counter field's type changes during a schema change.
    ValidationMode
    Configures whether and how objects are enqueued for validation in a JTransaction.
